Operation 'policysimulator.folders.locations.replays.operations.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary was empty, making it impossible for AI agents to understand the operation's purpose. Description was generic and lacked Policy Simulator domain context. Enhanced version: (1) Added specific summary indicating this retrieves operation status, (2) Clarified this is for Replay operations specifically, (3) Added context about polling pattern and use case, (4) Specified return type (GoogleLongrunningOperation), (5) Explained practical use case for AI agents (monitoring Replay execution). This helps agents understand when to use this operation in the context of managing asynchronous Replay simulations.

data.current_description: Gets the latest state of a long-running operation. Clients can use this method to poll the operation result at intervals as recommended by the API service.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current state of a long-running Replay operation. Use this method to poll the status of a Replay that was initiated asynchronously. Returns a GoogleLongrunningOperation object containing the operation's current status, progress, and results if completed. Useful for monitoring Replay execution and determining when results are available.
data.reasoning: Original summary was empty, making it impossible for AI agents to understand the operation's purpose. Description was generic and lacked Policy Simulator domain context. Enhanced version: (1) Added specific summary indicating this retrieves operation status, (2) Clarified this is for Replay operations specifically, (3) Added context about polling pattern and use case, (4) Specified return type (GoogleLongrunningOperation), (5) Explained practical use case for AI agents (monitoring Replay execution). This helps agents understand when to use this operation in the context of managing asynchronous Replay simulations.
